complaint.description: Must be the worst company in SA. They treat you like a robot, they don't listen, they read a script and forget there is a person on the other side. So glad my contract has ended. Goodbye Cell C.

meta.review_title: Cell C must be the worst!
meta.review_content: Must be the worst company in SA. They treat you like a robot, they don't listen, they read a script and forget there is a person on the other side. So glad my contract has ended. Goodbye Cell C.
